text: id need to see screenshots to understand better

*Request for HubSpot Datepicker*: Missing change event on input fields.
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBA9UA4EN/p1630413794020300>

If the HubSpot Datepicker write a date in the form input field, there is no event dispatched. Something like this is missing:
``` var event = new Event('change', { bubbles: true });
 datepicker_input_field.dispatchEvent(event);```
And then we can do something like this later:
```$('.hs_my_custom_date_property .hs-input').on('change',function(){ custom_validation() });```
